questionTitle: I'm sorry I ________ your party: I was away at the time.
The workmen made so much ________ that Mrs Walker had to spend three days cleaning up afterwards.
After the game, the referee was interviewed ________ television.
He thanked me for what I ________ the previous week.
________ going to the party.
Something extremely strange ________ yesterday while we were out jogging.
His English teacher recommends that he ________ a regular degree program.
How much snow ________ now?
When she was crossing the room the night-nurse happened to notice the old lady ________ to get out of bed .
This morning the postman was ________ down the street by my dog.
The way he never listens to me really gets ________ my nerves.
His speech was not appropriate ________ the occasion.
Her parents were very ________ because she was out so late that night.
If it ________, the match will be postponed .
You look very tired . I ________ papers all day.
When the boy ________ the car he was badly injured .
Monkeys belong to the group of animals ________ as primates.
When you do a favour for someone, don't expect anything ________.
Since your roommate is visiting her family this weekend, ________ you like to have dinner with us tonight?
How long ________ French?
